data.title: 15 Best Cafes In Mehrauli, Delhi For Great View
data.meta_description: Check out this list of some of the most amazing restaurants that offer a killer view of the Qutub Minar in Delhi!
data.text:
We’d all have to agree that Delhi has a spectacular food scene and some of the poshest, most extravagant, & swanky restaurants are nestled in Mehrauli, the food hub of D-city. Each of the eateries serves absolutely lip-smacking dishes but what makes them the best of the best is the breathtaking view of the tallest minaret. So, folks, we’ve put together a list of ah-amazing restaurants in Mehrauli that you defo need to check out to not just enjoy drinks & dinner but the killer view of the Qutub Minar as well. Read on!

1. The Grammar Room

Planning to have a hearty lunch? Then, you should definitely visit The Grammar Room, with its top-notch menu including the Mushroom Medley, Beanie Burger, Chicken Katsu Sando and the most enticing Prawn Curry that promises pure satisfaction. Enjoy the mesmerising view while you dine. So, what are you waiting for? Experience this culinary gem for your next meal.

Where | The Grammar Room - One Style Mile, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 11 AM - 12 PM

Meal for two | Rs 3,400

Call Them | +91 8130 288 558

Skim Through Their Feed | https://www.instagram.com/thegrammarroom/?hl=en

2. Diablo

Established in 2019, this well-known place offers an absolutely intriguing middle eastern cuisine in an old school inspired setting. Witness the aesthetic view that will register in your memory forever. Get ready to click selfies galore with your homies! And do make sure to try out their Veg Mezze Platter, Crispy Prawns and Irani Chicken Kebab just to name a few!

Where | Diablo - Qutab Garden, H-05, 12, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12 PM - 1 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,300 Onwards

Call Them | +91 9971 468 333

Skim Through Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/DiabloDelhi/

3. Bougie

Picture Credits: mallaica

We’re sure y’all must have heard of and seen this newly launched eatery on your Instagram feeds by now. Well, we truly get the hype. With super ‘bougie’, wooden and boho-chic interiors, this restaurant is buzzing and how! Alongside relishing the delicious menu, people have been drooling over their outdoor seating which gives a spectacular view of the Qutub Minar. So guys, if you haven’t visited Bougie yet, make sure to drop by for a meal with a breathtaking view!

Where | Bougie - 2nd Floor, Ambawatta One, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:00 - 9:00 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 3,200 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 9289 676 888

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/bougiedelhi

4. Ditas

Unleash your inner diva at Ditas, the Qutub's crown jewel! Ditas leaves no stone unturned when it comes to giving an out of ordinary experience, we kid you not. With European vibes and flawless decor, this Ditas is a sensory delight. Grab a Harrissa Chicken Skewer or Galangal and Zataar Spiced Tiger Prawns, and pair it with one of their mind-blowing concoctions. At Ditas, they've got your cravings covered!

Where | Ditas -H 5, Ward 1, Ambawatta One Complex, Kalka Das Marg, Mehraul

Timings | 12 Noon - 1 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,600

Call Them | +91 7428 850 566, +91 7428 850 743

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/ditas.delhi/

5. Dramz

Can we ever get enough of the all-time-fave rooftop bar? Dramz has undoubtedly been a go-to for most of us and why wouldn’t it be? We mean, the extensive multi-cuisine menu is A1, the cracking cocktails hit the right spot and the mesmerising view of the Qutub Minar is ideal to make it a perfect dine-out with the fam-bam. If you can’t recall the last time you visited this amazing eatery then consider this a sign and get going to devour some palatable dishes!

Where | Dramz - 1580/1, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 1:00 PM - 1:00 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,800 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 9311 022 419

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/Dramzdelhi

6. Miso Sexy

Say hello to the sexiest newbie in town. Who doesn’t relish a lavish Asian meal? Well, Miso Sexy is here to satiate all your Asian cravings with their finger-licking-good delicacies. The eye-catchy, modern & chic interiors are defo enough to lure people to this hip new eatery in Mehrauli. Alongside the appetising food and the nummy cocktails, the best part is their spectacular outdoor seating which gives a killer view of the Qutub Minar!

Where | Miso Sexy - H 5/3, H 5/4, 2nd Floor, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:00 - 9:00 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,200 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 9289 675 999

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/MisoSexyDelhi

7. Olive Bar and Kitchen

Delhi needs no introduction to, Olive Bar and Kitchen. nestled in a colonial building, offers more than just exquisite Italian dishes and signature cocktails. Dining with a view of the Qutub has never been this enchanting. Try the Toyosu Market Octopus or the Pork Belly & Cherry – they're as heavenly as they sound!

Where | Olive Bar & Kitchen -6-8, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:30 PM - 11:30 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 5,000

Call Them | +91 9810 235 472, +91 9910 457 373

Check Out Their FB Page https://www.facebook.com/OliveAtTheQutub/

8. Kakapo

If Sushi, Thai Salmon, Peking Duck with Kaka-Tail, are your jam. Then hit up Kakapo in the Qutub Complex for the most extraordinary view of the qutub. This restaurant is a visual treat straight out of Vogue, complete with a bedazzled tree and a serene rooftop. Serene is probably the humblest way to describe the beauty of this restaurant!

Where | Kakapo -House 5/5, 2nd Floor, Ward 1, Ambawatta One Complex, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12 Noon - 1 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 3,000

Call Them | +919899118943, +919319995830

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/kakaporestaurant/

9. Qla

If you’re a true Delhiite, you’d know that Qla tops the list of the most romantic restaurants for an ideal candle-light dinner or a date night. This rustic yet modern looking courtyard is known for its cosy and warm ambience and of course, the relish-worthy dishes. Most of us fosho have been fans of their plating skills but boy, that food tastes utterly delicious too which precisely ticks all the boxes for this eatery. Well, we’d recommend taking your boo out for a surprise dinner at Qla with delectable food, yummy drinks & a romantic view of the Qutub Minar!

Where | Qla - 4-A, Seven Style Mile, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:00 - 10:00 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 3,000 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 8527 098 766

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/QlaOfficial

10. Swan

Staying True to its name, Swan is the most majestic in Qutub . Witness the Qutub transform into a mirage as you relish one of a kind classy Japanese and Italian delights. With a breathtaking sunset view, Swan caters to every palate. Ps. Don't miss their out-of-this-world drink menu! Sip and sway at Swan!

Where | Swan -Kharsra 1501, 1st Floor, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:30 PM - 1 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,500

Call Them | +91 8130 922 899

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/swanqutub/

11. CHO

Keep ‘em newbies coming. Listen up Delhiizens, CHO is among the new restaurants that have popped up in the most aesthetically pleasing food hub of D-city and it’s safe to say that we’re totes drooling over their Vietnamese delights. The vibrant, palatable and wholesome plates of food are just enough to make you keep coming back for more. The vibe of this place with the stunning view of the Qutub Minar is just impeccable. So guys, get your weekend plans sorted and head to CHO with your pals!

Where | CHO - H5/1, FF LHS, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:00 - 10:30 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 3,000 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 9311 902 818

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/chonewdelhi

12. Thai High

Another ideal spot for that long-due romantic date with boo has to be Thai High. This stunning rooftop space boats elegance and has a killer view of the Qutub Minar which we’re sure you won’t get enough of. Their utterly delicious and authentic Thai delicacies have never failed to satisfy our cravings and some of our faves include Thai High Satay, Phad King Kae & the yummilicious Date On Fire dessert. Make reservations for two to relish a divine Thai meal under the glimmering night sky with the perfect view!

Where | Thai High - 109/1, Ambawatta Complex, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:00 PM - 12:00 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,200 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 7669 896 564

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/thaihigh

13. Rooh

Built inside a haveli, this eatery is an amalgamation of tradition & modernity. Rooh is the go-to place for cocktail connoisseurs but if you thought cocktails were it then you’re wrong ‘cause their extensive menu has equally good modern Indian and Continental dishes which are presented to you in the best possible way. This eatery is ideal for when you wanna head out with your gal pals for some snacks & drinks whilst admiring the beauty of the architectural marvel!

Where | Rooh - H-5/1, Ambawatta Complex, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:30 - 11:30 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 4,000 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 11 7156 4151

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/RoohNewDelhi

14. Bo-Tai

We just can’t get enough of Bo-Tai, can we? Their sumptuous Thai, Japanese & Asian delights have got us hooked to them and there’s no going back. This eatery is hands down the best to devour a relish-worthy meal along with classic cocktails. The outdoor seating gives a picturesque view of the Qutub Minar and we mean what better than hogging on our fave food with a view that just continues to amaze us. So guys & gals, make sure to head back to this evergreen restaurant and reminisce about those good ol’ days!

Where | Bo-Tai - 6/4, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli

Timings | 12:30 - 11:00 PM

Meal For Two | Rs 2,500 Onwards

Call Them | + 91 9870 587 770

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/BoTaiQutub

15. Dear Donna

Let's kick things off with this adorable eatery that's been melting hearts since day one. With both indoor and outdoor seating, it's a win-win. Feast on delights like Prawns Spaghetti Aglio Olio Pepperochino Pasta, Charred Udon Noodles, Pulled Chicken Cuban Sandwich, and much more!

Where | Dear Donna -Ground Floor, Shaheed Jeet Singh Marg, Block C

Timings | 12 Noon - 1 AM

Meal For Two | Rs 3,000

Call Them | +91 9139 636 363

Check Out Their FB Page | https://www.facebook.com/deardonnaqutub

Well, who doesn’t love a wholesome meal with a view? So guys, which one of these spectacular eateries are you making your reservations for?
